item.title: Current u-boot on a Macchiatobin
item.description: I recently broke out as Macchiatobin that I had laying around from a few years ago for testing arm64 support with Tinkerbell. I started with getting an updated version of EDK2 running on it. While the UEFI firmware was working well, it didn’t give me the ability to override the MAC addresses for the interfaces, which caused issues after the board booted into Linux, where a random MAC address was generated for each interface.
